New Records: Finn Allen broke the record for the highest individual score in a T20I innings by a New Zealander, scoring 137 runs.
Finn Allen also equaled the record for the most sixes in an inning in men's T20Is with 16 sixes.
Key Match Events: Finn Allen's record-breaking innings was the standout event of the match.
Pakistan struggled to chase the target, with only Babar Azam contributing significantly.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and opted to field first.
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand secured an unassailable 3-0 lead in the series with this victory.
Finn Allen's performance was a key highlight for New Zealand in the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a run-fest with New Zealand setting a high target of 225 runs.
The game was played at the University Oval Ground in Dunedin.
Others: Finn Allen's destruction of the Pakistan bowlers with 16 sixes and 5 boundaries was a key highlight.
The match saw a significant display of power-hitting from both sides.
